definitions: the process of turning from liquid into vapor

examples.text: snow cover prevents evaporation of water from the soil

shortDefinitions: process of turning from liquid into vapour

definitions: the process of something abstract ceasing to exist

examples.text: thousands of employees witnessed the rapid evaporation of their retirement plans
the police's attempt to dictate public policy led to a sudden evaporation of support

shortDefinitions: process of something abstract ceasing to exist
